question:
Which one of the following tumors (A) ~ (D) is involved in:
Sézary syndrome
Multiple myeloma
Hodgkin's lymphoma

Which one of the following defects (A) ~ (D) affects:
Purine nucleoside phosphorylase (PNP) deficiency
IL-4 deficiency
γc deficiency
Btk deficiency

options.C: Both B and T cell development
options.D: Neither B nor T cell development

question: Which one of the following chemokine receptors is expressed by the activated follicular B cells at the border between the T-cell area and a B-cell follicle in secondary lymphoid tissue?
Which deficiency leads to type 2 hyper IgM syndrome (HyperIgM-2)?
Which one of the followings is NOT the property of TI-1 antigens?

options.A: Antibody response in absence of T cells.
options.C: Antibody production in congenitally athymic individual.
options.D: Polyclonal B cells activation at high concentration.

question: Mice have deficiency in MHC I and CD3 molecules:

options.A: Both CD4 and CD8 cells mature
options.B: Either CD4 or CD8 cells mature
options.C: Neither CD4 nor CD8 cells mature

question: Which one is not the event during inflammation?
Which one is not a C3 convertase?
Which one is not involved in the innate immunity?
Which one is not the mechanism for tumor to avoid immune recognition?

Which one is not the event during inflammation?
blood clotting
explanation: （D）發炎四大特徵：紅、熱、腫、痛，所以 (D) 應改為 increase in vascular diameter。［出自考古第1題］

question: Which one is not a C3 convertase?
explanation: (B) 此題在07 是李建國老師的範圍，補體系統中只有 C2 是以a代表大單位，b 代表小單位，而C3 convertase 都是大單位組成，所以沒有C2b。［出自考古第2題］

question: Which one is not involved in the innate immunity?
explanation:
(A) Antimicrobial peptides 包含 Defensin、Cathelicidins 和 Histatins。
(B) TLRs 為一種PRR，可以辨識 PAMPs 並引起免疫反應。
(C) 生物體內的共生菌叢能夠透過競爭，避免外來菌種的入侵。(生物性防禦)［出自考古第3題］

question: Which one is not the mechanism for tumor to avoid immune recognition?
explanation:
腫瘤藉由下列幾種方式來避免免疫反應：
(A) Low immunogenicity
(B) Tumor treated as self antigen
(C) Antigenic modulation
(D) Tumor-induced immune suppression
(E) Tumor-induced privileged sites［出自考古第4題］

question: The $T_{H}17$ cells have been demonstrated to play important role on inducing inflammation to rheumatoid arthritis. Which of the following is associated with the development of such T cells in these patients?
Which of the following molecules is recently found to be associated with severe drug hypersensitivity reaction, Stevens-Johnson syndrome, to anti-seizure drug carbamazepine?
IVIG (intravenous immunoglobulin) can be used in the clinics for the treatment of which of the following?
Which of the following statement about “immunopathogenesis” is correct?

options.A: This is the common pathological mechanism induced by immunodeficiency
options.B: Pathological mechanisms induced by host immune response against pathogens
options.D: Pathological mechanisms caused by lack of T cells but not B cells
options.E: Pathological mechanisms of infection induced only in early childhood

question: “Hyper-IgM syndrome” can be found in all of the following “except”?
Which of the following immunodeficiency has the first signs of petechiae and bruising? (皮下瘀血)
Which of the following about chronic granulomatous disease is correct?

options.A: Is a form of graft versus host disease (GvHD)
options.B: Is caused by over production of IFN-γ
options.C: Can be prevented by irradiation of the recipient before transplantation
options.D: Is caused by NADPH oxidase defect

question: Carcinogen induced tumor derived from RAG2(RAG-/-) deficient mouse when transplanted into wild type mouse. (choose the incorrect statement)

options.A: Tumors cannot occur due to immunosurveillance
options.B: Tumors can be rejected by CD8+ T cell response
options.C: Tumors with high immunogenicity can induce anti-tumor immunity
options.D: Tumors with low immunogenicity will not be rejected

question: Which of the following statement about “tumor immunoediting” is incorrect?

options.A: Tumor can down-regulate the expression of MHC class I molecules
options.B: Tumor can down-regulate the expression of TCR molecules in T cells
options.C: Tumor can recruit the infiltration of immunosuppressive regulatory T cells
options.E: Tumor can cause T cell apoptosis

question: Which of the following statement is incorrect?

options.A: Tumor cells expressing MHC class I can be killed by CD8+ T cells
options.B: Tumors cells with MHC class I down-regulated can be killed by NK cells
options.C: Tumor antigens are recognized by NK cells
options.D: Tumor antigens can be different in wild-type and nude mice
options.E: Nude mice do not have normal adaptive immunity against tumor

question: The inclusion of GM-CSF in tumor vaccine is to?

options.A: Up-regulate MHC molecules in tumor cells
options.C: Enhance CD8+ cytotoxic T cell killing activity
options.D: Recruit and enhance dendritic cell function
options.E: Enhance B cell to produce tumor specific antibody

question: Herceptin (trastuzumab) is a monoclonal antibody effective in the treatment of?

(1) 該腫瘤發於T細胞時期。

(3) 該腫瘤發於B細胞的生發中心(germinal center)B細胞時期。

options.2: (2) 該腫瘤發於B細胞的漿細胞時期。
options.3: (3) 該腫瘤發於B細胞的生發中心(germinal center)B細胞時期。

question:
(A) AID: Hyper-IgM syndrome type 2
(B) Btk: Bruton's X-linked agammaglobulinemia
(C) CD40:Hyper-IgM syndrome type 3
(D) CD40L: Hyper-IgM syndrome type 1 (X-linked hyper-IgM syndrome)

options.D: (D) CD40L: Hyper-IgM syndrome type 1 (X-linked hyper-IgM syndrome)

question:
(A) TI-1、TI-2
(B) TD、TI-1
(C) TI-1、TI-2
(D) TI-1
(E) TD

(A) 因為 B-cell development is arrested at the pre-B-cell stage,所以最多只表現 Pre-B-cell receptor 而無法表現 Immature B cell 之後才有的IgM。
(B) CVID 介紹見上面 1.(5) 介紹,屬於 B-cell instrinsic hyper-IgM syndrome。
(C)(D)(E)皆為Hyper-IgM syndrome。

options.A: (A) 因為 B-cell development is arrested at the pre-B-cell stage,所以最多只表現 Pre-B-cell receptor 而無法表現 Immature B cell 之後才有的IgM。
options.B: (B) CVID 介紹見上面 1.(5) 介紹,屬於 B-cell instrinsic hyper-IgM syndrome。

question:
配合題:pick up the right answer from the below list
Contact dermatitis

options.D: both Type II and Type III hypersensitivity
options.E: Type I, II and III hypersensitivity
options.G: all of the Type I, II, III and IV hypersensitivity
options.H: none of any type of hypersensitivity

explanation: (1) Type IV hypersensitivity 不是抗體造成，而是由細胞(主要是 $T_{H}$ cell) 造成，稱為 cell-mediated hypersensitivity。以 $T_{H}1$ 為例:接觸性皮膚炎(allergic contact dermatitis)和 tuberculin reaction(結核菌素反應)［出自考古第1題］

question:
配合題:pick up the right answer from the below list
Hay fever

options.D: both Type II and Type III hypersensitivity
options.E: Type I, II and III hypersensitivity
options.G: all of the Type I, II, III and IV hypersensitivity
options.H: none of any type of hypersensitivity

explanation: (2) Hay fever(乾草熱)又稱花粉熱，主要由花粉或塵蟎造成，在成人中常見，容易流鼻水、打噴嚏,屬於 Type I hypersensitivity［出自考古第1題］

question:
配合題:pick up the right answer from the below list
Steven Johnson syndrome

options.D: both Type II and Type III hypersensitivity
options.E: Type I, II and III hypersensitivity
options.G: all of the Type I, II, III and IV hypersensitivity
options.H: none of any type of hypersensitivity

explanation: (3) Stevens-Johnson syndrome 是一個嚴重的皮膚過敏性疾病,臨床上常發生於病人對藥物的過敏反應,嚴重可能致死。先前在東亞人種的研究發現 HLA-B*1502 和對藥物 carbamazepine (CBZ)引起的 Steven-Johnson syndrome 有強烈相關,目前遺傳諮詢或是用藥前同意書都會調查是否帶有 HLA-B*1502的 allele。另外 HLA-B*5801 在歐洲人種的研究中被發現與藥物 allopurinol 有關。屬於 Type IV hypersensitivity［出自考古第1題］

question:

Serum sickness
(inject animal serum)

options.D: both Type II and Type III hypersensitivity
options.E: Type I, II and III hypersensitivity
options.G: all of the Type I, II, III and IV hypersensitivity
options.H: none of any type of hypersensitivity
